for_schools_faq_list.question: When will I know if my class time is confirmed?
for_schools_faq_list.answer: You will receive an email a week before the class start date with a final confirmation of the class time.

for_schools_faq_list.question: What is the cost of the classes?
for_schools_faq_list.answer: Classes cost a minimum of $100, however, we do offer fee waivers if you are unable to pay the class fees.
